message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to be offering you the chance to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $11,000. I believe this is a fair reflection of its worth.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save as much as I can. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $9,500 is significantly below its true value. I could consider letting it go for $10,500. This is a compromise I'm willing to make, but I can't go any lower.
I understand your concerns, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $9,800 for the product. I think this is a fair compromise considering its value to me.
